verses.verse: And it came to pass <WH1961> in the seventh <WH7637> year, <WH8141> in the fifth <WH2549> month, the tenth <WH6218> day of the month, <WH2320> that certain <WH376> of the elders <WH4480> <WH2205> of Israel <WH3478> came <WH935> to inquire <WH1875> <WH853> of the LORD, <WH3068> and sat <WH3427> before <WH6440> me.
Then came <WH1961> the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> speak <WH1696> <WH853> unto the elders <WH2205> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Are ye <WH859> come <WH935> to inquire <WH1875> of me? As I <WH589> live, <WH2416> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> I will not <WH518> be inquired <WH1875> of by you.
Wilt thou judge <WH8199> them, son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> wilt thou judge <WH8199> them? cause them to know <WH3045> <WH853> the abominations <WH8441> of their fathers: <WH1>

And say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> In the day <WH3117> when I chose <WH977> Israel, <WH3478> and lifted up <WH5375> mine hand <WH3027> unto the seed <WH2233> of the house <WH1004> of Jacob, <WH3290> and made myself known <WH3045> unto them in the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> when I lifted up <WH5375> mine hand <WH3027> unto them, saying, <WH559> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God; <WH430>

In the day <WH3117> that I lifted up <WH5375> mine hand <WH3027> unto them, to bring them forth <WH3318> of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt <WH4714> into <WH413> a land <WH776> that <WH834> I had espied <WH8446> for them, flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> which <WH1931> is the glory <WH6643> of all <WH3605> lands: <WH776>

Then said <WH559> I unto <WH413> them, Cast ye away <WH7993> every man <WH376> the abominations <WH8251> of his eyes, <WH5869> and defile not yourselves <WH2930> <WH408> with the idols <WH1544> of Egypt: <WH4714> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

But they rebelled <WH4784> against me, and would <WH14> not <WH3808> hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> me: they did not <WH3808> every man <WH376> cast away <WH7993> <WH853> the abominations <WH8251> of their eyes, <WH5869> neither <WH3808> did they forsake <WH5800> the idols <WH1544> of Egypt: <WH4714> then I said, <WH559> I will pour out <WH8210> my fury <WH2534> upon <WH5921> them, to accomplish <WH3615> my anger <WH639> against them in the midst <WH8432> of the land <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>

But I wrought <WH6213> for my name's sake, <WH4616> <WH8034> that it should not <WH1115> be polluted <WH2490> before <WH5869> the heathen, <WH1471> among <WH8432> whom <WH834> they <WH1992> were, in whose <WH834> sight <WH5869> I made myself known <WH3045> unto <WH413> them, in bringing them forth <WH3318> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt. <WH4714>
Wherefore I caused them to go <WH3318> out of the land <WH4480> <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> and brought <WH935> them into <WH413> the wilderness. <WH4057>
And I gave <WH5414> them <WH853> my statutes, <WH2708> and showed <WH3045> them my judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> if a man <WH120> do, <WH6213> <WH853> he shall even live <WH2421> in them.

Moreover also <WH1571> I gave <WH5414> them <WH853> my sabbaths, <WH7676> to be <WH1961> a sign <WH226> between <WH996> me and them, that they might know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> that sanctify <WH6942> them.

But the house <WH1004> of Israel <WH3478> rebelled <WH4784> against me in the wilderness: <WH4057> they walked <WH1980> not <WH3808> in my statutes, <WH2708> and they despised <WH3988> my judgments, <WH4941> which <WH834> if a man <WH120> do, <WH6213> <WH853> he shall even live <WH2421> in them; and my sabbaths <WH7676> they greatly <WH3966> polluted: <WH2490> then I said, <WH559> I would pour out <WH8210> my fury <WH2534> upon <WH5921> them in the wilderness, <WH4057> to consume <WH3615> them.

But I wrought <WH6213> for my name's sake, <WH4616> <WH8034> that it should not <WH1115> be polluted <WH2490> before <WH5869> the heathen, <WH1471> in whose <WH834> sight <WH5869> I brought them out. <WH3318>

Yet also <WH1571> I <WH589> lifted up <WH5375> my hand <WH3027> unto them in the wilderness, <WH4057> that I would not <WH1115> bring <WH935> them into <WH413> the land <WH776> which <WH834> I had given <WH5414> them, flowing <WH2100> with milk <WH2461> and honey, <WH1706> which <WH1931> is the glory <WH6643> of all <WH3605> lands; <WH776>

Because <WH3282> they despised <WH3988> my judgments, <WH4941> and walked <WH1980> not <WH3808> in my statutes, <WH2708> but polluted <WH2490> my sabbaths: <WH7676> for <WH3588> their heart <WH3820> went <WH1980> after <WH310> their idols. <WH1544>
Nevertheless mine eye <WH5869> spared <WH2347> <WH5921> them from destroying <WH4480> <WH7843> them, neither <WH3808> did I make <WH6213> an end <WH3617> of them in the wilderness. <WH4057>

But I said <WH559> unto <WH413> their children <WH1121> in the wilderness, <WH4057> Walk <WH1980> ye not <WH408> in the statutes <WH2706> of your fathers, <WH1> neither <WH408> observe <WH8104> their judgments, <WH4941> nor <WH408> defile yourselves <WH2930> with their idols: <WH1544>
I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God; <WH430> walk <WH1980> in my statutes, <WH2708> and keep <WH8104> my judgments, <WH4941> and do <WH6213> them;

And hallow <WH6942> my sabbaths; <WH7676> and they shall be <WH1961> a sign <WH226> between <WH996> me and you, that ye may know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD <WH3068> your God. <WH430>

Notwithstanding the children <WH1121> rebelled <WH4784> against me: they walked <WH1980> not <WH3808> in my statutes, <WH2708> neither <WH3808> kept <WH8104> my judgments <WH4941> to do <WH6213> them, which <WH834> if a man <WH120> do, <WH6213> <WH853> he shall even live <WH2421> in them; they polluted <WH2490> <WH853> my sabbaths: <WH7676> then I said, <WH559> I would pour out <WH8210> my fury <WH2534> upon <WH5921> them, to accomplish <WH3615> my anger <WH639> against them in the wilderness. <WH4057>

Nevertheless I withdrew <WH7725> <WH853> mine hand, <WH3027> and wrought <WH6213> for my name's sake, <WH4616> <WH8034> that it should not <WH1115> be polluted <WH2490> in the sight <WH5869> of the heathen, <WH1471> in whose <WH834> sight <WH5869> I brought them forth. <WH3318> <WH853>

I <WH589> lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> mine hand <WH3027> unto them also <WH1571> in the wilderness, <WH4057> that I would scatter <WH6327> them among the heathen, <WH1471> and disperse <WH2219> them through the countries; <WH776>

Because <WH3282> they had not <WH3808> executed <WH6213> my judgments, <WH4941> but had despised <WH3988> my statutes, <WH2708> and had polluted <WH2490> my sabbaths, <WH7676> and their eyes <WH5869> were <WH1961> after <WH310> their fathers' <WH1> idols. <WH1544>
Wherefore I <WH589> gave <WH5414> them also <WH1571> statutes <WH2706> that were not <WH3808> good, <WH2896> and judgments <WH4941> whereby they should not <WH3808> live; <WH2421>

And I polluted <WH2930> them in their own gifts, <WH4979> in that they caused to pass through <WH5674> the fire all <WH3605> that openeth <WH6363> the womb, <WH7356> that <WH4616> I might make them desolate, <WH8074> to the end <WH4616> that <WH834> they might know <WH3045> that <WH834> I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>

Therefore, <WH3651> son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> speak <WH1696> unto <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> and say <WH559> unto <WH413> them, Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Yet <WH5750> in this <WH2063> your fathers <WH1> have blasphemed <WH1442> me, in that they have committed <WH4603> a trespass <WH4604> against me.

For when I had brought <WH935> them into <WH413> the land, <WH776> for the which <WH834> I lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> mine hand <WH3027> to give <WH5414> it to them, then they saw <WH7200> every <WH3605> high <WH7311> hill, <WH1389> and all <WH3605> the thick <WH5687> trees, <WH6086> and they offered <WH2076> there <WH8033> <WH853> their sacrifices, <WH2077> and there <WH8033> they presented <WH5414> the provocation <WH3708> of their offering: <WH7133> there <WH8033> also they made <WH7760> their sweet <WH5207> savor, <WH7381> and poured out <WH5258> there <WH8033> <WH853> their drink offerings. <WH5262>

Then I said <WH559> unto <WH413> them, What <WH4100> is the high place <WH1116> whereunto <WH834> <WH8033> ye <WH859> go? <WH935> And the name <WH8034> thereof is called <WH7121> Bamah <WH1117> unto <WH5704> this <WH2088> day. <WH3117>

Wherefore <WH3651> say <WH559> unto <WH413> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Are ye <WH859> polluted <WH2930> after the manner <WH1870> of your fathers? <WH1> and commit ye whoredom <WH2181> <WH859> after <WH310> their abominations? <WH8251>

For when ye offer <WH5375> your gifts, <WH4979> when ye make your sons <WH1121> to pass <WH5674> through the fire, <WH784> ye <WH859> pollute yourselves <WH2930> with all <WH3605> your idols, <WH1544> even unto <WH5704> this day: <WH3117> and shall I <WH589> be inquired of <WH1875> by you, O house <WH1004> of Israel? <WH3478> As I <WH589> live, <WH2416> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> I will not <WH518> be inquired of <WH1875> by you.

And that which cometh <WH5927> into <WH5921> your mind <WH7307> shall not <WH3808> be at all, <WH1961> <WH1961> that <WH834> ye <WH859> say, <WH559> We will be <WH1961> as the heathen, <WH1471> as the families <WH4940> of the countries, <WH776> to serve <WH8334> wood <WH6086> and stone. <WH68>

As I <WH589> live, <WH2416> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> surely <WH518> <WH3808> with a mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and with a stretched out <WH5186> arm, <WH2220> and with fury <WH2534> poured out, <WH8210> will I rule <WH4427> over <WH5921> you:

And I will bring you out <WH3318> <WH853> from <WH4480> the people, <WH5971> and will gather <WH6908> you out of <WH4480> the countries <WH776> wherein <WH834> ye are scattered, <WH6327> with a mighty <WH2389> hand, <WH3027> and with a stretched out <WH5186> arm, <WH2220> and with fury <WH2534> poured out. <WH8210>
And I will bring <WH935> you into <WH413> the wilderness <WH4057> of the people, <WH5971> and there <WH8033> will I plead <WH8199> with <WH854> you face <WH6440> to <WH413> face. <WH6440>

Like as <WH834> I pleaded <WH8199> with <WH854> your fathers <WH1> in the wilderness <WH4057> of the land <WH776> of Egypt, <WH4714> so <WH3651> will I plead <WH8199> with <WH854> you, saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
And I will cause you to pass <WH5674> under <WH8478> the rod, <WH7626> and I will bring <WH935> you into the bond <WH4562> of the covenant: <WH1285>

And I will purge out <WH1305> from <WH4480> among you the rebels, <WH4775> and them that transgress <WH6586> against me: I will bring them forth <WH3318> <WH853> out of the country <WH4480> <WH776> where they sojourn, <WH4033> and they shall not <WH3808> enter <WH935> into <WH413> the land <WH127> of Israel: <WH3478> and ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD. <WH3068>

As for you, <WH859> O house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Go <WH1980> ye, serve <WH5647> ye every one <WH376> his idols, <WH1544> and hereafter <WH310> also, if <WH518> ye will not <WH369> hearken <WH8085> unto <WH413> me: but pollute <WH2490> ye my holy <WH6944> name <WH8034> no <WH3808> more <WH5750> with your gifts, <WH4979> and with your idols. <WH1544>

For <WH3588> in mine holy <WH6944> mountain, <WH2022> in the mountain <WH2022> of the height <WH4791> of Israel, <WH3478> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD, <WH3069> there <WH8033> shall all <WH3605> the house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> all <WH3605> of them in the land, <WH776> serve <WH5647> me: there <WH8033> will I accept <WH7521> them, and there <WH8033> will I require <WH1875> <WH853> your offerings, <WH8641> and the firstfruits <WH7225> of your oblations, <WH4864> with all <WH3605> your holy things. <WH6944>

I will accept <WH7521> you with your sweet <WH5207> savor, <WH7381> when I bring you out <WH3318> <WH853> from <WH4480> the people, <WH5971> and gather <WH6908> you out of <WH4480> the countries <WH776> wherein <WH834> ye have been scattered; <WH6327> and I will be sanctified <WH6942> in you before <WH5869> the heathen. <WH1471>

And ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> when I shall bring <WH935> you into <WH413> the land <WH127> of Israel, <WH3478> into <WH413> the country <WH776> for the which <WH834> I lifted up <WH5375> <WH853> mine hand <WH3027> to give <WH5414> it to your fathers. <WH1>

And there <WH8033> shall ye remember <WH2142> <WH853> your ways, <WH1870> and all <WH3605> your doings, <WH5949> wherein <WH834> ye have been defiled; <WH2930> and ye shall loathe yourselves <WH6962> in your own sight <WH6440> for all <WH3605> your evils <WH7451> that <WH834> ye have committed. <WH6213>

And ye shall know <WH3045> that <WH3588> I <WH589> am the LORD, <WH3068> when I have wrought <WH6213> with <WH854> you for my name's sake, <WH4616> <WH8034> not <WH3808> according to your wicked <WH7451> ways, <WH1870> nor according to your corrupt <WH7843> doings, <WH5949> O ye house <WH1004> of Israel, <WH3478> saith <WH5002> the Lord <WH136> GOD. <WH3069>
Moreover the word <WH1697> of the LORD <WH3068> came <WH1961> unto <WH413> me, saying, <WH559>

Son <WH1121> of man, <WH120> set <WH7760> thy face <WH6440> toward <WH1870> the south, <WH8486> and drop <WH5197> thy word toward <WH413> the south, <WH1864> and prophesy <WH5012> against <WH413> the forest <WH3293> of the south <WH5045> field; <WH7704>

And say <WH559> to the forest <WH3293> of the south, <WH5045> Hear <WH8085> the word <WH1697> of the LORD; <WH3068> Thus <WH3541> saith <WH559> the Lord <WH136> GOD; <WH3069> Behold, <WH2009> I will kindle <WH3341> a fire <WH784> in thee, and it shall devour <WH398> every <WH3605> green <WH3892> tree <WH6086> in thee, and every <WH3605> dry <WH3002> tree: <WH6086> the flaming <WH3852> flame <WH7957> shall not <WH3808> be quenched, <WH3518> and all <WH3605> faces <WH6440> from the south <WH4480> <WH5045> to the north <WH6828> shall be burned <WH6866> therein.
And all <WH3605> flesh <WH1320> shall see <WH7200> that <WH3588> I <WH589> the LORD <WH3068> have kindled <WH1197> it: it shall not <WH3808> be quenched. <WH3518>
Then said <WH559> I, Ah <WH162> Lord <WH136> GOD! <WH3069> they <WH1992> say <WH559> of me, Doth he <WH1931> not <WH3808> speak <WH4911> parables? <WH4912>
